name: CarecamPro
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
CareCam pro cameras are designed to help you look afteryour home and family in a more convenient andsmarter way -even when you're away.

With the CareCam Skill and Alexa, you can now accessyour CareCam pro Camera via voice control by simplysaying "Alexa,show me the Camera."

Before you get started, please make sure your CareCam pro device is online and updated to the lates tfirmware.
To get started, select the "Enable Skill' button to link your CareCam pro account and discover your CareCamcameras.

After linking your CareCam account and discoveringyour CareCam cameras in your Alexa account. you canstart controlling your cameras

To look the camera of the front door camera, you can say:
“Alexa,show me the front door camera"
“Alexa talk to the front door camera"

Compatible CareCam Cameras:
AJR53PO0804
AJR30PGO705
AJL33PC0801
Firmware version :
YGT.SY-LA3PA1601-V231027.1914
 
Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices:Echo Show
*When using this Skill, you need to specify the nameof the desired camera.
The name is equivalent to the location of where thecamera was installed and can be found andconfigured in the CareCam pro app.
You can also add CareCam pro cameras to new or existinggroups in the Alexa app.
